Example 4.10 (Cholesky Factorization)
Consider a symmetric, positive deﬁnite matrix A ∈R3×3. We are inter-
ested in ﬁnding its Cholesky factorization A= LL⊤, i.e.,
A=


a11 a21 a31
a21 a22 a32
a31 a32 a33

l31 l32 l33
